tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_metrics (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    success_metric VARCHAR,
    performance_metric FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  project_manager VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE kpis (
  kpi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  kpi_name VARCHAR(50),
  kpi_description TEXT,
  kpi_value FLOAT,
  kpi_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE kpis (
    kpi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    kpi_name VARCHAR(255),
    kpi_value DECIMAL,
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_type VARCHAR(50),
    kpi_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (kpi_id) REFERENCES kpis(kpi_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_metrics (
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    completion_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    team_size INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE kpi_metrics (
    kpi_id INT NOT NULL,
    kpi_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    kpi_description TEXT,
    target_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    achieved_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (kpi_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_team (
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    team_member_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_metrics(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_results (
    result_id INT NOT NULL,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    kpi_id INT NOT NULL,
    result_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    result_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (result_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_metrics(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (kpi_id) REFERENCES kpi_metrics(kpi_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_kpis (
    kpi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    kpi_name VARCHAR(255),
    goal DECIMAL,
    actual DECIMAL,
    project_id INT REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);
